CustomField.description: Used to record the Answer that has been given to a Work Step question via the Flow "MSN - Field Service Mobile App - Work Step Answers" as part of a Work Plan for a given Work Order.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If you type in an answer on this Work Step Template, this will then show up as a prepopulated answer on the Work Step for the mobile user.
CustomField.label: Work Step Answer
